attributes.action: go ahead with the road pricing policy, and invest the money raised in public transport and cycle networks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people will take a short sighted view and vote with their pockets against road pricing. However in order to tackle global warming and behave responsibly we need to reduce car use. Road charges will cut congestion and carbon emissions and could raise up to £16bn a year in payments. We ask the government to pledge to invest this money in public transport and cycle paths.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "go ahead with the road pricing policy, and invest the money raised in public transport and cycle networks."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14621.asp
